examples.example: 我今天买了一升新鲜的牛奶，准备用来做美味的蛋糕。

translate.english: I bought one liter of fresh milk today and am going to use it to make delicious cakes.

examples.example: 我每天都会喝一升健康的白开水，来保持身体的良好状态。

translate.english: I drink one liter of healthy boiled water every day to keep my body in a good state.

examples.example: 我往锅里加了一升纯净的水，准备煮美味的饺子。

translate.english: I added one liter of pure water to the pot and prepared to cook delicious dumplings.
